mapper.insert: insert into sys_office( parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, code, type, grade ) values( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{code}, #{type}, #{grade} )
mapper.update: update sys_office set parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, code = #{code}, type = #{type}, grade = #{grade} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete sys_office where id=#{id} or parent_ids like '%,'||#{id}||',%' and id<>1
mapper.select: select a.id, a.parent_id as "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.name, a.sort, a.code, a.type, a.grade, p.name as "parent.name" from sys_office a left join sys_office p on a.parent_id = p.id where a.id = #{id}
select id, parent_id as "parent.id", parent_ids, name, sort, code, type, grade from sys_office order by sort
select id, parent_id as "parent.id", parent_ids, name, sort, code, type, grade from sys_office where parent_id = #{id} order by sort
